page.title: 01AREA 032/00020/03440315
page.content: This area is an entirely rural, agricultural setting.It is bounded by the village of Bicton to the south,the hamlets of Mytton & Fitz to the north _ west & Leaton Knolls to the east.The dominant feature of the area is a sweeping meander of the River Severn,which dissects the region. The area is largely undulating grassland interspersed with mixed (mainly deciduous) woodland & large bands of managed woodland on its fringes.The land rolls downwards to the flood _ plain of the Severn. Population is scattered & sparse and _ as one would expect in an unspoilt & remote setting _ amenities are very few,with the largest nearby facilities being in Bomere Heath & tne county town,Shrewsbury.
